translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The citizen Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu, through his undersigned attorney, states that it is indispensable to register in the Treasury the amount that, according to the attached documents, the State owes him, [...] therefore, Your Excellency.

Attorney: Domingos José de Almeida Bagé, March 17, 1842.

Power of attorney attached. Session of the Treasury Court in Bagé, March 17, 1842. Fontoura.

In the originals there is a 2nd copy.
